name: leuquim-plugins
description: Personal Claude Code plugins for development workflows

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: Complete development workflow: define, research, plan, work, review, compound. Includes semantic search, prompt engineering, and agent building.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Multi-agent code review with detection and verification layers. Reduces false positives through lifecycle analysis, scope boundaries, and evidence-based validation.

plugins.name: toolbox
plugins.description: Meta-tools for building Claude extensions: create agents, skills, slash commands, prompts, and documentation with best practices and templates.

plugins.name: rules-curation
plugins.description: Autonomous curation of Claude Code memory rules in .claude/rules/ - creating, revising, consolidating, and removing rules as understanding evolves.
